name: Lust Rune
Description: Strange pink runes have been scattered around the area. How they got there is unknown, but they're still something to be cautious of.

theScene: Mientras camina hacia adelante y aprecia el paisaje, ¡una intrincada runa rosa aparece de repente debajo de ti!
Try to use your magical powers to destroy the rune! (Intelligence)
